meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Bomb Blast in Indonesia A car bomb exploded in the garage under Jakarta's stock exchange, killing 15 people and wounding dozens. It was the latest in a series of recent unexplained bombings.
Bomb Blast in Indonesia A car bomb exploded in the garage under Jakarta's stock exchange, killing 15 people and wounding dozens. It was the latest in a series of recent unexplained bombings.
McDonald's Foe Sentenced A French farmer who became something of a national hero for an attack on a McDonald's restaurant last year was sentenced to three months in prison for vandalism.

Action on Boeing 737's The government plans to require replacement of the rudder controls on Boeing 737's because a malfunction in the system caused a crash near Pittsburgh six years ago that killed 132 people.
